actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 93-1262.

official_title: Resolution reported increasing the limitation on expenditures by the Committee on the Judiciary.

summary.text: Increases the authorization of appropriations from $3,000 to $8,000 available for consultants and organizations in the Senate Judiciary Committee's authorization for investigation of administrative practice and procedure for the period March 1, 1973, to February 28, 1974.

titles.title: Resolution reported increasing the limitation on expenditures by the Committee on the Judiciary.
